name: Footprints Festival

config_properties.name: Footprints Festival
config_properties.description: A curated discovery festival at TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht, showcasing emerging international artists across diverse genres.

ai_profile:
**Footprints Festival 2026: A Celebration of Global Sounds and Diversity**  

The Footprints Festival 2026 brings together 11 talented artists from across the globe, offering a rich tapestry of genres that span Electronic, Psychedelic, Indie Pop, Jazz, and more. With a remarkable average rating of 7.73, the lineup promises high-quality performances, featuring artists from countries as diverse as Germany, Turkey, Nigeria, Brazil, and Iran. Notably, all participating acts have Spotify links available, ensuring fans can easily explore their music ahead of the festival.  

A standout feature of this yearâ€™s festival is its celebration of cultural and musical diversity. Seven of the artists identify as people of color, and the lineup reflects a broad spectrum of traditional and contemporary sounds, from Anatolian rock and Malian desert blues to minimalist electropop and Afrobeat. The inclusion of genres like Traditional Iranian and Armenian Folk alongside experimental and 80s-inspired music highlights the festival's commitment to showcasing unique voices and perspectives from around the world.  

While the majority of acts are male-led, the festival also includes female and mixed-gender representation, adding to the inclusive spirit of the event. With a strong emphasis on cross-cultural exchange and eclectic artistry, Footprints Festival 2026 is set to provide an unforgettable experience for music enthusiasts seeking fresh, global sounds.
